creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: From a suite of four color lithographs. The mat and frame were designed by the artist.
inscription: Signed, Dated, Numbered, Printed Inscription, and Chop Mark
medium: Color lithograph and rubber stamp with color-printed mat and hand-painted frame
signed:
LR: [Hollis Sigler 1982]
LR: [ap 1/7]
UC: [There Is A Doubt, She Could Be Right]
LR: VEL Chop Mark
title: There Is a Doubt, She Could Be Right
